title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:

09:16 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki

10:36 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki

11:17 <lucaa> has quit  
11:47 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:51 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
13:05 <abusenius> has quit  
13:18 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
13:28 <mflorea> has quit  
13:29 <jamesxu> has joined #xwiki  
13:46 <arkub> has quit  
13:50 <arkub> has joined #xwiki  
14:16 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
14:23 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:26 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
14:30 <vmassol> jenkins upgrade planned?  
14:30 <vmassol> (I see it's red)  
14:31 <vmassol> re-running all ui tests again locally to find flickering ones  
14:31 <vmassol> it's easy: everytime you run it you hit the jackpot...  
14:32 <vmassol> wow: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/786/testReport/  
14:32 <vmassol> +105  
14:36 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
14:37 <+sburjan> :( what is happening ?  
14:39 <vmassol> where is our build manager?  
14:45 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:47 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
14:52 <@sdumitriu> This looks terrible: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/786/testReport/  
15:02 <vmassol> this last run is really strange  
15:03 <vmassol> since I don't see any usual issue in the logs  
15:03 <vmassol> like we have when it's an agent issue  
15:03 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
15:03 <@sdumitriu> It just stopped  
15:03 <vmassol> stopped?  
15:03 <@sdumitriu> Ah, I'm talking about the previous one  
15:03 <vmassol> I'm talking about http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/lastBuild/testReport/  
15:04 <@sdumitriu> Which stopped executing for no reason  
15:04 <vmassol> trying to find out how to see workspace files  
15:04 <vmassol> tmortagne: do you remember?  
15:04 <vmassol> want to see the screenshots  
15:05 <vmassol> hmm here it's z jvm crash: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/786/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui/EditInlineTest/testEditButtonTriggersInlineEditing/  
15:05 <arkub> has quit  
15:06 <vmassol> maybe all tests failed after that crash  
15:07 <vmassol> sdumitriu: this is weird: http://ci.xwiki.org/manage  
15:07 <@sdumitriu> Probably because of the upgrade  
15:07 <+tmortagne> vmassol: you can only look at the current workspace  
15:07 <+tmortagne> in http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/  
15:08 <vmassol> ah that's why  
15:08 <vmassol> hmmm tooo bad  
15:08 <vmassol> ok screenshots for that run are in http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/ws/xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/target/screenshots/  
15:08 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/ws/xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/target/screenshots/AnnotationsTest-defaultAnnotationsTest.png  
15:08 <vmassol> that's why  
15:08 <vmassol> they're all the same  
15:09 <@sdumitriu> Ah, nice  
15:09 <@sdumitriu> The good news is that we don't have ~200 broken tests  
15:09 <vmassol> we can log on the amchine and check why XE cannot be accessed  
15:10 <vmassol> agent1  
15:11 <@sdumitriu> Does anybody know why LDAP tests fail?  
15:12 <vmassol> probably for the same reason  
15:12 <+tmortagne> sdumitriu: which one ?  
15:12 <@sdumitriu> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ldap/786/testReport/  
15:12 <vmassol> hmm I see several hudson processes started on agent1  
15:12 <vmassol> sdumitriu: do a ps -ef there  
15:13 <vmassol> I don't know if that's normal  
15:13 <+tmortagne> hmm looks like it's my fault  
15:13 <+tmortagne> fogot a revert in LDAP tests  
15:13 <+tmortagne> checking if I pushed it  
15:14 <vmassol> I see this: http://tinypaste.com/aee53  
15:14 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Looks normal  
15:14 <vmassol> processes 4382 and 27503 seem to be both hudson agent  
15:15 <@sdumitriu> Only 23047 is the agent itself  
15:15 <@sdumitriu> The others are normal during test execution  
15:15 <+tmortagne> indeed I forgot a revert  
15:16 <vmassol> hmm wget http://localhost:8080 seems ok on agent1  
15:17 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: It is working now  
15:17 <@sdumitriu> That was just for ui tests  
15:17 <vmassol> tmortagne: there's also http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-cluster/786/testReport/org.apache.maven.surefire.junit4/JUnit4Provider/org\_xwiki\_test\_cluster\_AllTests/  
15:18 <@sdumitriu> Also a typo in that message: befpre  
15:18 <jvdrean> has quit  
15:18 <vmassol> fixing it  
15:19 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
15:19 <vmassol> done  
15:20 <arkub> has joined #xwiki  
15:22 <@sdumitriu> Should I split the test job into several jobs, one for each module?  
15:22 <+tmortagne> should be ok fo LDAP test now, I did reverted 3.1 and 3.0 already but forgot master  
15:23 <vmassol> tmortagne: we do'nt have the xml files anymore for the cluster tests?  
15:23 <vmassol> it seems to be the reason it's failing  
15:23 <vmassol> InputStream is = getClass().getResourceAsStream("/" + filename); seems to be returning null  
15:24 <vmassol> it's called by  
15:24 <+tmortagne> vmassol: ha crap i removed them from unit test since it was useless and forgot integration test were using theses files  
15:24 <vmassol>         initChannel(executors.get(0), "tcp1");  
15:24 <vmassol>         initChannel(executors.get(1), "tcp2");  
15:24 <+tmortagne> will take  care of it  
15:24 <vmassol> ok  
15:25 <+tmortagne> will refactor integration test to also use integrated jgroups configuration, will be nicer  
15:25 <vmassol> yes  
15:30 <+tmortagne> hmm for that I need to be able to provide custom parameters to the executor, not sure we have that already  
15:30 <+tmortagne> will add something  
15:32 <vmassol> sdumitriu: nice tool while waiting for our git diff email: http://psionides.github.com/gitifier/  
15:32 <vmassol> (only issue is that it clones the repos yet again)  
15:33 <@sdumitriu> And it's for mac only  
15:42 <tmortagne> has quit  
15:44 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
15:53 <@sdumitriu> ci.xwiki.org updated and restarted  
15:56 <npm> has quit  
16:00 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
16:07 <vmassol> sburjan: you'll like this: http://code.google.com/p/selenium/wiki/AdvancedUserInteractions  
16:07 <vmassol> (it's available since RC1)  
16:07 <+sburjan> hehe.. LOL .. I only waited one year for this :P  
16:07 <+sburjan> thanks !  
16:07 <vmassol> no idea if it works though  
16:07 <vmassol> I'm giving rc2 another try today  
16:08 <vmassol> just saw that rc3 is almost ready too  
16:08 <+sburjan> they're getting close to release v1 .. cool  
16:08 <vmassol> btw rc1 has "Support for native events in Firefox"  
16:08 <vmassol> last time I tried rc2 there were tons of erros, trying again  
16:10 <+tmortagne> jboss maven resitory is down, they really need to release stuff on central maven more...  
16:11 <+tmortagne> makes it a real pain to build right now  
16:12 <@cjdelisle> I think our nexus is mirroring them so we should be able to just change the pom file  
16:13 <vmassol> cjdelisle: I started setting up a cache on our nexus indeed but didn't finish that  
16:13 <xwiki-ci> has joined #xwiki  
16:13 <vmassol> the idea was that in your settings.xml you'd just have to put our nexus url  
16:14 <vmassol> (and in our poms)  
16:14 <@cjdelisle> hey, myxwiki.org is here :)  
16:14 <+tmortagne> lets try with -o, hope I already have everything  
16:14 <vmassol> that said we'd need to check with XWiki SAS since it might cause a huge bandwidth need  
16:14 <+tmortagne> yes not sure it's the best thing to do  
16:14 <xwiki-ci> has quit  
16:16 <xwiki-ci> has joined #xwiki

19:10 <vmassol> ok here's how to reproduce  
19:10 <@sdumitriu> Data in background contexts becomes invalid  
19:10 <vmassol> change the hourly job  
19:10 <vmassol> and instead of 0 0 \* \* ....  
19:10 <vmassol> use: 0 \* \* \* \* ...
